[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer_schemas/src/schema/event_sequence_number/mod.rs] [Edge case: Empty event stream] For EventKeys that never emit events, is a sequence number entry created with value 0, and can this cause confusion with streams that have emitted exactly 1 event (sequence 0)? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer_schemas/src/schema/event_sequence_number/mod.rs] [Edge case: Deleted accounts] If an account is deleted but its EventKey entries remain in EventSequenceNumberSchema, can this cause memory leaks or incorrect sequence reuse if the account is recreated? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer_schemas/src/schema/event_sequence_number/mod.rs] [Edge case: System events] Do system-generated events (governance, staking) use EventSequenceNumberSchema, and can sequence number corruption in system events break critical protocol operations? (Critical)
